title: Club Statues
body:
Hello, quick question, whats the current statues of Clubs right now? Last update ive found on the problem was 2 weeks ago, and while some of the problems have been fixed im dealing with two right now. 

1. I created a club awhile back and its up and running again BUT i am not in it. (Im the owner)  
2. People within the club cant see me either and we are unable to make some changes to the tags and names currently.

Do we have a time period when they will be up and running again or at the least any updates on what has being going on? 

Thanks!
-Loney man with no club :(

replies.body:
I don't have a timeline on when the fix for the clubs issues will roll out, but our teams are working their asses off to get it out as soon as possible.

You can keep up with any future updates on the clubs issue on [this thread.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) Let me know if you have any other questions.

Clubs issues have been resolved. It sounds like you're still experiencing issues with yours, so I'd recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where we can help you resolve this for good.
